title: Eddie Reveals He Almost Gave Up On Barstool Forever - Behind the Blog
description:
Alright, bang bang, Eddie Farrer sits down with KFC to talk about his life, journey to Barstool, and plans for the future. This is Behind the Blog.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
